==================================================
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
==================================================
1. What is Unmanaged VPS ?
Unmanaged VPS is like having your own dedicated server but with the cost benefits of shared hosting. While you will technically be sharing the same hardware server with others, that server will be divided into separate virtual servers that are allocated to specific entities.

2. Is it possible to start off on a monthly plan and later switch to a yearly plan?
Yes, This is absolutely Possible.

3. Do you provide refunds after the server has been ordered?
No, We do not provide any refunds on dedicated servers, Please get all your quarries cleared before hand!
==================================================
